item.title: CPNG
item.description: score:82 Chances: Coupang (NYSE:CPNG) stock broke out and jumped 11.4% in the afternoon session after the company announced it would raise its WOW membership by 58% Significantly high institutional ownership implies Coupang’s stock price is sensitive to their trading Earnings results often give us a good indication of what direction a company will take in the months ahead Risks: Coupang shares remain down more than 60% from their initial public offering price The post-pandemic era witnessed significant readjustments in terms of shifting back to shopping in physical stores There were revisions on the downside for some of the major e-commerce players Score:82 chances characters count - risks characters count = 82
